entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
